channel.title: Mute/Ban/Jail/IPBan/IPMute/
channel.description:
I want to make a command so when I type ::0 (Player Name), ::1 (Player Name), ::2 (Player Name), ::3 (Player Name), ::4 (Player Name), ::5 (Player Name) this happens:
0 - Removed all Punishments 1 - Mute 2 - Ban 3 - Jail 4 - IPBan 5 - IPMute

item.title: Mute/Ban/Jail/IPBan/IPMute/
item.dc:creator: @bobbykinney000 bobbykinney000
item.description:
@bobbykinney000 wrote:

its because of the commands being for a delta source.
what source are you using.

Read full topic

item.title: Mute/Ban/Jail/IPBan/IPMute/
item.dc:creator: @WestSideMass WestSideMass
item.description:
@WestSideMass wrote:

I put it in there, got some errors with the sM so I changed it to sendMessage and those were fixed, but then I got these.

Compiling..... client.java:11250: incompatible types found : boolean required: int p.muted = true; ^ client.java:11251: cannot find symbol symbol : method writeLog(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) location: class client writeLog(p.playerName, "mutes"); ^ client.java:11268: cannot find symbol symbol : method writeLog(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) location: class client writeLog(p.playerName, "bans"); ^ client.java:11285: cannot find symbol symbol : variable toX location: class client p.toX = 2933; ^ client.java:11286: cannot find symbol symbol : variable toY location: class client p.toY = 3285; ^ client.java:11287: cannot find symbol symbol : variable action location: class client p.action = 1; ^ client.java:11290: cannot find symbol symbol : method yell(java.lang.String) location: class client yell("["+playerName+"] - Has just Jailed "+p.playerName+ "!."); ^ client.java:11304: cannot find symbol symbol : method writeLog(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) location: class client writeLog(p.playerLastConnect, "ipbans"); ^ client.java:11306: cannot find symbol symbol : method yell(java.lang.String) location: class client yell("["+playerName+"] - Has just IP-Banned "+p.playerName+"!."); ^ client.java:11315: cannot find symbol symbol : variable playersInPit location: class PlayerHandler sendMessage(""+PlayerHandler.playersInPit+""); ^ client.java:11324: cannot find symbol symbol : method writeLog(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) location: class client writeLog(p.connectedFrom, "mutes2"); ^ client.java:11325: incompatible types found : boolean required: int p.muted = true; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 12 errors Compiling Finished. Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: Mute/Ban/Jail/IPBan/IPMute/
item.dc:creator: @bobbykinney000 bobbykinney000
item.description:
@bobbykinney000 wrote:

ok here you go put this into your client.java where the rest of your commands are its got it all except the ::0 one but its as simple as deleting there names from files.

[code=java](command.startsWith(“1”) && playerRights > 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                    p.muted = true;
		writeLog(p.playerName, "mutes");
		sM("You have muted "+p.playerName+"!");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to mute..");
            }
        }

if (command.startsWith(“2”) && (playerRights >= 1)) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

		writeLog(p.playerName, "bans");
		p.disconnected = true;
		sM("You have banned "+p.playerName+"!");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to ban..");
            }
        }

if (command.startsWith(“3”) && playerRights > 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    p.toX = 2933;
		p.toY = 3285;
		p.action = 1;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been jailed by " + playerName);
		yell("["+playerName+"] - Has just Jailed "+p.playerName+"!.");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to jail..");
            }
        }

if (command.startsWith(“4”) && playerRights > 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(6);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if (otherPIndex != -1) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
writeLog(p.playerLastConnect, “ipbans”);
disconnected = true;
yell("["+playerName+"] - Has just IP-Banned “+p.playerName+”!.");
} else {
sM(“The name doesnt exist.”);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sM(“Try entering a name you want to ip ban…”);
}
}
if(command.startsWith(“people”)){
sM(""+PlayerHandler.playersInPit+"");
}
if (command.startsWith(“5”) && playerRights > 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(7);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                    writeLog(p.connectedFrom, "mutes2");
		p.muted = true;
                    p.sM(
                            "You have been ip muted by " + playerName);
		sM("You have ip muted "+p.playerName+"");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to tele to ip mute..");
            }
        }[/code]

Read full topic
